## Properties

| Property     | Attribute | Description               | Type          | Default     |
| ------------ | --------- | ------------------------- | ------------- | ----------- |
| `iconConfig` | --        | config for icon component | `IIconConfig` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name             | Description       |
| ---------------- | ----------------- |
| `--f-icon-color` | Color of the icon |
| `--f-icon-size`  | Size of the icon  |
